challenge: Drink a shot with the barkeeper!
Introduce yourself to one random guest in the bar!
Challenge a stranger to thumb wrestle with you!
Tell the hottest person in the room your worst pick-up line!
Eat an ice cube. The first one to finish gets a free beer from your friends!
Ask the barkeeper to play Angels by Robbie Williams
Ask for a special cocktail. The barkeeper has free choice of the ingrediants!
Sing into a song of your choice while making eye contact with several other guests!
Rock-Paper-Sissers. Winner gets free shot from your friends!
Ask for a plain water. When you get it, drink one sip and then ask for some Vodka to add to it.
Between this stop and the next bar, play one round of Flunky ball!
